means: 缺少( want的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: He wants to act in concert with other nations.
sentence.Network_cn: 他想和其他国家采取一致行动。

sentence.Network_en: He wants companies to follow the European model of social responsibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 他希望各公司能够以欧洲公司为榜样，承担社会责任。

sentence.Network_en: Who wants to buy a computer from a failing company?
sentence.Network_cn: 谁愿意从一家要倒闭的公司买计算机呢？

PerfectNetExp.abs: 需要（needs）与欲求（wants）分作公共性质与私人性质两类。无论是个人或是社会，均须决定哪些需要与欲求，要在多大程度之内…
but he wants to be just like Vincent Price .但是他希望自己成为VincentPrice那样的人。
wanted signal 期望信号wants 消费欲WAP 析蜡点
Tina can always round her father when she wants something ., 每当蒂娜要想买些东西时 , 她总是能说服她父亲.

Pulau Ketam (Crab Island) 吉胆岛 ...... I want 我要 ... 4 12前一张后一张  Pulau Ketam (Crab Island) 吉胆岛 ... Steve-h, the-father, ||.
研究性学习结题报告 - 免费文档下载 ... 106,EMS (邮政)特快专递 107,Hands Wanted 招聘 108,Introductions 说明.

2013届高校毕业生网上招聘周 ... 邀请函 INVITATION 求职 JOB WANTED 招聘 RECRUITMENT.

entry.def: If you want something, you feel a desire or a need for it.

example.ex: I want a drink...
example.tran: 我想喝点什么。

example.ex: Ian knows exactly what he wants in life...
example.tran: 伊恩很清楚他需要什么样的生活。

entry.def: You can say that you want to say something to indicate that you are about to say it.

example.ex: I want to say how really delighted I am that you're having a baby...
example.tran: 我想说你怀孕了我有多高兴。

example.ex: Look, I wanted to apologize for today. I think I was a little hard on you.
example.tran: 听我说，我想就今天的事向你道歉。我觉得我对你有点过于苛刻了。

entry.tran: (用于疑问句中表示提议或邀请)想要，需要
entry.def: You use want in questions as a way of making an offer or inviting someone to do something.

example.ex: Do you want another cup of coffee?...
example.tran: 你想再来一杯咖啡吗？

example.ex: Do you want to leave your bike here?
example.tran: 你想把自行车停在这里吗？

entry.def: If you say to someone that you want something, or ask them if they want to do it, you are firmly telling them what you want or what you want them to do.

example.ex: I want an explanation from you, Jeremy...
example.tran: 杰里米，我需要你解释一下。

example.ex: If you have a problem with that, I want you to tell me right now...
example.tran: 如果你有异议，我要你马上告诉我。

entry.def: If you say that something wants doing, you think that it needs to be done.

example.ex: The windows wanted cleaning...
example.tran: 窗户该擦了。

example.ex: Her hair wants cutting.
example.tran: 她该剪头发了。

entry.def: If you tell someone that they want to do a particular thing, you are advising them to do it.

example.ex: You want to be very careful not to have a man like Crevecoeur for an enemy...
example.tran: 你应当格外小心，别与克雷弗克这样的人为敌。

example.ex: You want to look where you're going, mate.
example.tran: 伙计，你应当看看你要去哪里。

entry.def: If someone is wanted by the police, the police are searching for them because they are thought to have committed a crime.

example.ex: They were wanted by the police...
example.tran: 他们被警方通缉。

example.ex: He has killed many in his time, and is wanted in at least three countries...
example.tran: 他那个时候杀了很多人，现在至少有3个国家在通缉他。

entry.def: If you want someone, you have a great desire to have sex with them.

example.ex: Come on, darling. I want you.
example.tran: 亲爱的，过来。我想要你。

entry.def: If a child is wanted, its mother or another person loves it and is willing to look after it.

example.ex: Children should be wanted and planned...
example.tran: 应当好好照看孩子，并为他们规划一生。

example.ex: I want this baby very much, because it certainly will be the last.
example.tran: 我很爱这个小宝贝，因为它肯定是我最后一个孩子了。

entry.def: If someone wants you in a particular place or role, they desire you to be in that place or role.

example.ex: Albie wants you in his office...
example.tran: 阿尔比要你去他办公室。

example.ex: They didn't want her as attorney general...
example.tran: 他们不想要她做司法部长。

entry.def: A want of something is a lack of it.

example.ex: ...a want of manners and charm...
example.tran: 缺乏风度和魅力

example.ex: The men were daily becoming weaker from want of rest.
example.tran: 由于缺乏休息，这些男人日渐虚弱。

entry.def: Want is the state of being extremely poor.

example.ex: He said they were fighting for freedom of speech, freedom of worship, and freedom from want.
example.tran: 他说他们在为言论自由而战，为信仰自由而战，为远离贫困而战。

entry.def: Your wants are the things that you want.

example.ex: She couldn't lift a spoon without a servant anticipating her wants and getting it for her...
example.tran: 要是没有仆人事先想她所想并为她准备妥当，她连汤匙也举不起来。

example.ex: Supermarkets often claim that they are responding to the wants of consumers by providing packaged foods.
example.tran: 超市经常声称他们根据消费者的需要提供包装食品。

entry.def: If you do something for want of something else, you do it because the other thing is not available or not possible.

example.ex: Many of them had gone into teaching for want of anything better to do...
example.tran: 因为没有更好的工作，他们当中很多人做了教师。

example.ex: There was another emotion, and for want of a better word he called it grief.
example.tran: 还有一种情感，由于找不到更好的字眼来描绘，他称它为悲痛。

entry.def: You say if you want when you are making or agreeing to an offer or suggestion in a casual way.

example.ex: Mary says you're welcome to stay the night if you want...
example.tran: 玛丽说如果你愿意，可以在这儿呆一宿。

example.ex: 'Do you want to go through it all?' — 'Yeah, if you want.'
example.tran: “你想把它都看完吗？”——“是的，如果你愿意的话。”

entry.def: People sometimes say 'I don't want to be rude', for example, or 'without wanting to be rude' as a way of apologizing or warning you when they are going to say something which might upset, annoy, or worry you.

example.ex: 'I don't want to appear big-headed,' explains Loubet, 'but I would say there is a 95% chance of success.'...
example.tran: “我并不想显得自大，”劳伯特解释说，“但我有95%的成功把握。”

example.ex: Without wanting to sound mean about it, these things all have to come from a budget.
example.tran: 我并不想显得小气，但所有这些东西都必须从预算中开支。

entry.tran: (粗暴或生气地问)你想干什么？
entry.def: If you say to someone 'what do you want?', you are asking them in a rather rude or angry way why they have come to the place where you are or why they want to speak to you.

example.ex: 'What do you want!' she whispered savagely. 'Get out.'...
example.tran: “你想干什么！”她粗野地低语道，“滚开。”

example.ex: 'Bernie's been on the phone.' — 'What does he want?'
example.tran: “伯尼来过电话。”——“他想干什么？”

auth_sentence.content: No surprise then that it wants to get smart.
auth_sentence.res_content: No surprise then that it wants to get smart.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No surprise then that it wants to get smart.

auth_sentence.content: He also wants a greater emphasis on repeat scans.
auth_sentence.res_content: He also wants a greater emphasis on repeat scans.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He also wants a greater emphasis on repeat scans.

auth_sentence.content: This audience wants humour and friendliness from our presenters.
auth_sentence.res_content: This audience wants humour and friendliness from our presenters.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This audience wants humour and friendliness from our presenters.

Sentence.sentence: It wants to expand its storage of crude oil.
It wants to keep its own environment intact
For example, a Colombian who wants someone to approach him often signals with a hand movement in which all the fingers of one hand, cupped, point downward as they move rapidly back and forth.
The woman wants to get a degree in administration
She wants to go traveling on the weekend
And since she wants to go back to work, I've decided to take a year off to raise the baby.
